meanings.sent1: The botchiest repair job I've ever seen was done by my clumsy brother.
meanings.sent2: She always makes the botchiest attempts at cooking, but we love her effort.
meanings.sent3: His botchiest painting looked like a colorful mess, but he called it abstract art.
meanings.sent4: The botchiest haircut she gave herself left her with uneven bangs and a crooked line.
meanings.sent5: The botchiest DIY project turned into a disaster when the shelves collapsed.

meanings.sent1: It was the botchiest repair job I had ever seen, with parts falling off within days.
meanings.sent2: The botchiest attempt at fixing the leak only made it worse.
meanings.sent3: The botchiest wrapping job on the gift made it look like a crumpled mess.
meanings.sent4: Her botchiest performance on stage left the audience cringing in their seats.
meanings.sent5: The botchiest decision he made was to paint the house without proper preparation.
